definition: in a wild or reckless manner, cheerfully irresponsible, a reckless impetuous irresponsible person
details:
adverb
- in a wild or reckless manner
= example: in a wild or reckless manner
= synonyms: pell-mell
adjective
- cheerfully irresponsible
= synonyms: slaphappy, devil-may-care, carefree, freewheeling, happy-go-lucky
noun
- a reckless impetuous irresponsible person
= synonyms: daredevil, madcap, lunatic, hothead, swashbuckler
